(Bridge West-side)
IMP CA[_]SAR DIVI F AVGVSTV[...]AXIM C[...]X TRIBVNIC POTEST XXXVII P P
TI CAESAR DIVI AVGVSTI F D[...]GVST PONTIF[...]S IIII IMP VIII TRIB POTEST XXII

transcription: [Imp(erator) Caesar D]ivi f(ilius) Augustus pontifex maxim(us) co(n)s(ul) XIII imp(erator) XX tribunic(ia) potest(ate) XXXVII p(ater) p(atriae)
[Ti(berius) Caes]ar Divi Augusti f(ilius) Divi Iuli n(epos) August(us) pontif(ex) maxim(us) co(n)s(ul) IIII imp(erator) VIII trib(unicia) potest(ate) XXII
Imp(erator) Ca[e]sar Divi f(ilius) Augustu[s] [pontifex m]axim(us) c[o(n)s(ul) XIII imp(erator) X]X tribunic(ia) potest(ate) XXXVII p(ater) p(atriae)
Ti(berius) Caesar Divi Augusti f(ilius) D[ivi Iuli n(epos) Au]gust(us) pontif(ex)[maxim(us) co(n)]s(ul) IIII imp(erator) VIII trib(unicia) potest(ate) XXII
translation: The emperor, son of the divine Caesar, Augustus, pontifex maximus, consul fourteen times, greeted as emperor twenty times, awarded with the tribunicia potestas thirtyseven times, pater patriae.

Tiberius Caesar, son of the divine Augustus, nephew of the divine Julius, Augustus, pontifex maximus, consul four times, greeted as emperor eight times, awarded with the tribunicia potestate twenty-two times.
